description: The pilot makes an entry call to the tower, reporting their position and altitude.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Crossing Z-2
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, we are crossing Z-2 maintaining 1500ft.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report field in sight
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, maintain 1500ft, report field in sight Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, report field in sight
calls.message: Maintain 1500ft, will report field in sight Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports that the airfield is in sight.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Field in sight
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, field in sight Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report initial
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report initial Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, report initial
calls.message: Will report initial Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports the beginning of the initial approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Initial
calls.message: {Call Sign}, initial Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report end of initial
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report end of initial Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, report end of initial
calls.message: Will report end of initial Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports the end of the initial approach and receives descent instructions.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: End of initial
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, end of initial Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Descend to 1000ft
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, descent to 1000ft join beginning of downwind.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, descend to 1000ft
calls.message: Descending to 1000ft, will join beginning of downwind, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports entering the downwind leg of the traffic pattern.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Beginning of downwind
calls.message: {Call Sign}, we are beginning of downwind Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report end of downwind
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report end of downwind Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, report end of downwind
calls.message: Will report end of downwind Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports turning onto the base leg.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Turning base
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, we are turning base leg.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report final
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report final for Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, report final
calls.message: Will report final for Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on final for a full stop landing and receives clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Final for full stop
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, final for full stop.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared to land
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, check gears down and locked, S/W 210/08 kts, clear for full stop.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Cleared to land
calls.message: Wind copied, cleared to land Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on final for a touch & go and receives clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Final for touch & go
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, final for touch & go.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared for touch & go
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, check gears down and locked, S/W 210/08 kts, clear for touch & go.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Cleared for touch & go
calls.message: Wind copied, cleared for touch & go Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on final for a low go and receives clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Final for low go
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, final for low go.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared for low go
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, check gears down and locked, S/W 210/08 kts, clear for low go.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Cleared for low go
calls.message: Wind copied, cleared for low go Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: After landing, the tower provides taxi instructions to the pilot.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Taxi to ground
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, taxi via Oscar after vacating contact ground 121.8.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, taxi to ground
calls.message: Taxi via Oscar, after vacating contact ground 121.8, {Call Sign}.
